title: Thomas Nagel with CS Lewis and Jordan Peterson on Naturalism and Truth
description:
Lewis wrote in the 40s and was a Christian apologist. Nagel is currently a world class philosopher. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Nagel 

Mind and Cosmos https://www.amazon.com/Mind-Cosmos-Materialist-Neo-Darwinian-Conception/dp/0199919755 

How to Think https://www.amazon.com/How-Think-Survival-Guide-World/dp/B0769X1SQ5
